articles.title: SPA Greets Participants in Festival of Korean Youth in Japan
articles.content:
SPA Greets Participants in Festival of Korean Youth in Japan
Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK Sunday sent a message of greetings to the participants in the Festival of Korean Youth in Japan on the occasion of the festival opening amid the keen interest and expectation of the Koreans in Japan and the people in the homeland.
					 It said:
					
					 The officials of the young generation of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and patriotic Korean youth, cherishing the faith of Juche, have firmly built their organizations at various levels and made a great contribution to rallying broad strata of young Koreans under the banner of patriotism even under the grim situation where the reactionaries inside and outside Japan have become undisguised in their suppression and obstructions. 
					
					 Recalling that Chongryon has developed into a powerful organization with its roots struck deep among the compatriots, demonstrating the dignity and stamina as a genuine organization of overseas compatriots of the DPRK, the message stressed that this is associated with the boundless devotion and noble efforts of the above-said officials and young Koreans.
					
					 It went on:
					
					The Presidium of the SPA of the DPRK is pleased and highly appreciates the officials of the young generation of Chongryon and young Koreans for having dynamically advanced the patriotic work of Chongryon and the movement of the Koreans in Japan generation after generation with the single-minded ardent loyalty to their leader, country and organization.
					
					 The organizations of the young generation of Chongryon should channel bigger efforts into the work to establish the ideological system, the leadership system of Juche within the organizations at all levels, thus helping the young Koreans give invariable and steady continuity to the patriotic tradition and spirit associated with the noble soul of the patriotic forerunners who remained loyal to their leader and country.
					
					 The organizations of the young generation should build their organizations into well-regulated ones in each area where young Koreans live, rally more ones around them and organize in a unique manner varieties of mass movements suited to the characteristics of the younger generation so that the Korean community may always pervade with patriotic enthusiasm and national emotion of young Koreans.
					
					 The young Koreans in Japan should do more good things conducive to achieving the prosperity of the motherland and its independent reunification and deepening the friendship with the Japanese people.
					
					 The Presidium of the SPA of the DPRK firmly believes that the festival of young Koreans in Japan will mark an occasion in bringing about a significant change in giving fullest play to the wisdom and enthusiasm of the overseas young Koreans to usher in a new heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan and successfully carrying forward and developing the patriotic work of Chongryon.

articles.title: DPRK Wins Title of AFC U-16 Soccer Championship
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Title of AFC U-16 Soccer Championship
Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK boys football team placed the first in the 2010 Asian U-16 Soccer Championship.
					The DPRK footballers defeated its Uzbek rival 2-0 in the finals on Sunday.

articles.title: DPRK Wins Vietnam Football Association Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Wins Vietnam Football Association Cup
Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The DPRK footballers placed the first at the 2010 International Soccer Tournament for Vietnam Football Association Cup which was held in Vietnam from November 2 to 6. 
					 The DPRK team (U-21), the Vietnam state football selection, the Singaporean state football selection and the south Korean olympic football selection (U-21) competed at league matches.
					
					 The DPRK team beat its Singaporean rival 2:1 at the first match held on November 2, drew match 1:1 with south Korean rival on November 4 and defeated the Vietnamese rival 2:0 on November 6. 
					
					 The DPRK team gathered 7 points in total.

articles.title: Attempt to Evade Blame for Deteriorated Inter-Korean Relations Blasted
articles.content:
Attempt to Evade Blame for Deteriorated Inter-Korean Relations Blasted
Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- Minister of Unification Hyon In Thaek and newly-appointed Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade Kim Song Hwan of south Korea have recently repeated such assertion that the north should be held responsible for what it has done in order to normalize the inter-Korean relations.
					 Commenting on this fact, a news analyst of Minju Joson today says:
					
					 It is none other than Hyon and other ultra-right conservatives who arrested the favorably developing inter-Korean relations with the watchword of "no nukes, opening and 3000 dollars". So it is those conservative forces that should settle such knotty problem.
					
					 Recently the reunion of the separated families and relatives from the north and the south was held, thanks to the active step and sincere efforts of the DPRK side, and working talks between the authorities for the resumption of Mt. Kumgang tourism are put on the agenda. The south Korean people and overseas compatriots have demanded that the conservative authorities of south Korea take measures to warm up the north-south relations, not chilling the atmosphere of dialogue provided with much efforts. Meanwhile, such argument is heard even from the ruling quarters of south Korea that the authorities should turn to the improvement of the north-south relations since the continuation of the deteriorated relations is unfavorable for them.
					
					 This trend of the times is driving into a tight corner Hyon who invented the watchword of "no nukes, opening and 3000 dollars" and has taken the lead in the racket for confrontation between the fellow countrymen, Kim who has enticed the chief executive to bedevil the inter-Korean relations and other ultra-right conservatives of south Korea. That is why Hyon and Kim are making desperate efforts to shift the responsibility for the bedeviled north-south relations on to other. So, they pretend to be interested in the improved inter-Korean relations, frequently making the said assertion.
					
					 Hyon and Kim would be well advised to apologize to the nation for the crimes committed by them to hurt the fellow countrymen so far and immediately halt the moves for confrontation with fellow countrymen, far from impudently repeating the said assertion. This is a solution to the problem brought up by themselves.

articles.title: Global Independence and Development of S-S Cooperation Called for
articles.content:
Global Independence and Development of S-S Cooperation Called for
Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- To make the whole world independent is the common cause of humankind, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a signed article.
					 Global independence helps peoples of all countries achieve the independent development of their countries and nations and the common prosperity of humankind in an independent and peaceful new world free from domination and subordination and aggression and war, the article notes, and goes on to say;
					
					 Without international unity and cooperation nobody can expect the global independence. Only when all the countries and nations strengthen international unity and cooperation on the basis of the principles of independence, equality and mutual respect, is it possible to create favorable conditions for realizing independence of each country and nation and accelerate the cause of global independence.
					
					 The peoples of developing countries should maintain the principle of collective self-reliance to discard dependence on developed countries and expand and develop the South-South cooperation in the spirit of independence and solidarity.
					
					 Many countries in the world attach importance to the military affairs and direct big efforts to the defense upbuilding, following the Songun idea and the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea. And they are boosting military exchange and cooperation while establishing the collective defense security system. The Songun idea and the Songun politics, almighty treasured sword and invincible banner, give strength and courage to the world progressive people but deal a telling blow to the imperialist aggression forces.
					
					 Comprehensive development of the South-South cooperation means the anti-imperialist struggle and the key to victory in the struggle lies in Songun.
					
					 Without possession of great military strength is it impossible to expand and develop the South-South cooperation and achieve the safe socio-economic development.
					
					 Powerful military strength makes it possible to repel any aggression and war moves of the imperialists and further expand and develop the South-South cooperation.

articles.title: Resolution to Struggle against Fascist Suppression Expressed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Resolution to Struggle against Fascist Suppression Expressed in S. Korea
Pyongyang, November 7 (KCNA) -- The Students Committee of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration in south Korea Wednesday issued a statement on the 81st anniversary of the Kwangju student incident.
					 Recalling that the Kwangju student movement was launched on Nov. 3, 1929 to protest against the harsh colonial rule and predatory policy of the Japanese imperialists, the statement said that this struggle started by youth and students in Kwangju rapidly expanded throughout the country to turn into a fierce anti-Japanese resistance. 
					
					 The present reality requires the youth and students to stand in the van of the struggle of justice against dictatorship and suppression, it said.
					
					 The conservative group is nowadays kicking up a racket of reckless repression with mobilization of military forces under the pretext of "prevention of terrorism" with an international meeting as an occasion, the statement said, stressing the need for the youth and students to valiantly struggle against it.
					
					 It declared that the youth and students would turn out in the struggle to put an end to the present dictatorial regime by inheriting the fighting spirit of the Kwangju students and joining efforts with the righteous people.
					
					 It called upon the youth and students to cherish firm confidence in victory and wage a vigorous struggle so as to surly punish the present regime suppressing the popular masses.
